Text:
Annual LADWP CO2 emmissions

 

CO2 is a greenhouse gas generated by certain forms of power generation. It is also one of the primary contributors to climate change. Our city owned utility tracks emissions in an effort to curb CO2 pollution while meeting Los Angeles' energy demands.

Reducing Crime

 

Assorted metrics for tracking crime reduction efforts including incidents of Part I Crime and Gang Related Crime

LA County Employment

 

Overall employment is an important measure of our region's economic health.

311 App Adoption 

Increased use of the MyLA311 app allows for more efficient management and delivery of city services
